#summary Put gquest info into a miniwindow
=== Table of Contents ===
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =

 * This is a plugin that puts gq info into a miniwindow
 * It will automatically update when a gq mob is killed

= Help =
 {{{
/*
miniwin_gq 1 Options
-----------------------------------------------
help           : show help
set            : set script and window vars, show plugin vars when called with no arguments, 'window': show window vars, 'all': show all vars
*/
 }}}


= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [window]
  * [class]
  * [pluginhelper]
  * [verify]
  * [broadcast_gq]
 * download from stable [http://code.google.com/p/bastmush/source/browse/branches/stable/worlds/plugins/Aardwolf/miniwin_gq.xml here] (make a note of the revision, it will help troubleshoot) or checkout with subversion and copy into the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * the miniwindow will not show until gquest info has been received
